channel.title: My friends can't connect to my server!
channel.description:
I am using the 4.1 Moparscape client. I don't have any source except this 'Hybrid Scape'. I don't know what it is and I can't find the source at my computer. Well I downloaded it and my friends did the same. I've also portforwarded to 100% on port 43594, I got the latest JRE and JDK and I've made my OS (Windows 7) able to recognize it. Anyways when the client has loaded at http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape4.php I enter a new ip adress (My own, 5.53.xxx.xxx) and selected a New Port number (43594) and hitted 'Start Server'. The client server says that everything is fine, whatever like 'Starting server at 0.0.0.0:43594 and I connect. I can freely walkaround and play singleplayer but my friends can't connect to my server? What do they need? I mean when they enter that page and download Hybrid Scape source automatically I guess they got everything? I tell them my ip, port and the try to connect but it says Error connecting to server? help
EDIT: There is some kind of error when it's the webclient is starting up: [code]denying: (java.util.PropertyPermission java.io.tmpdir read) denying: (java.util.PropertyPermission java.io.tmpdir read) denying: (java.util.PropertyPermission java.io.tmpdir read) denying: (java.util.PropertyPermission java.io.tmpdir read) denying: (java.util.PropertyPermission java.io.tmpdir read) denying: (java.util.PropertyPermission java.io.tmpdir read) denying: (java.util.PropertyPermission java.io.tmpdir read) denying: (java.util.PropertyPermission java.io.tmpdir read) [/code]
+ That I can play singleplayer normaly however when I ping my server it says: [code]Ping is ---[/code]

item.description:
@loho97 wrote:

Ok, I’m adding you but please take a look at the edit what is that?
